```{r}
# Load package
devtools::install_github("mattflor/chorddiag")
library(chorddiag)
library(htmlwidgets)
```

```{r}
# Create dummy data
m <- matrix(c(25,  5,  5, 20, 0, 45, 
              15,  10,  7, 8, 5, 55, 
              30,  10,  5, 8, 7, 40, 
              13,  12,  9, 21, 3, 42, 
              22,  7,  5, 8, 0, 58, 
              18,  6,  5, 14, 2, 55),
            byrow = TRUE,
            nrow = 6, ncol = 6)

# A vector of 4 colors for 4 groups
schools <- c("CYTech", "AMU", "EA", "UFC", "UPPA", "Autres")
dimnames(m) <- list(To = schools,
                    From = schools)

# Build the chord diagram:
p <- chorddiag(m, type = "bipartite", showTicks = F, groupnameFontsize = 18, groupnamePadding = 15, margin = 90, width = 1200, height = 800, palette = "Spectral", palette2 = "Spectral")

# save the widget
saveWidget(p, file="chord_interactive_NoTick_Bipartite.html")

# Build the chord diagram:
q <- chorddiag(m, showTicks = F, groupnameFontsize = 18, groupnamePadding = 15, margin = 90, width = 1200, height = 800, palette = "Spectral")

# save the widget
saveWidget(q, file="chord_interactive_NoTick.html")


# Build the chord diagram:
r <- chorddiag(m, showTicks = T, tickInterval = 5, groupnameFontsize = 18, groupnamePadding = 25, margin = 90, width = 1200, height = 800, palette = "Spectral")

# save the widget
saveWidget(r, file="chord_interactive_Tick.html")

```
